description:
At The Law Firm of Aaron A. Herbert, P.C., we appreciate that those who have suffered a devastating personal injury are in need of an experienced, dedicated attorney. Clients in the Dallas, Texas, area can count on us to go above and beyond what most might expect from an injury attorney. At our law firm, we are passionate about doing our utmost to help our clients recover from harm that was caused through no fault of their own.

 

In addition to motor vehicle collisions and pedestrian accidents, we handle a wide range of personal injury matters, including construction accidents, dog bites, premises liability and more. For more than 10 years, our law firm has been building a reputation throughout northern Texas and beyond as one of the areaâ€™s strongest and most respected firms to represent the injured. Our clients receive in-depth, focused attention. Our founder, Mr. Herbert, is board certified in personal injury trial law by the Texas Board of Legal Specialization. This distinction is found in less than 2 percent of attorneys statewide.

 

At The Law Firm of Aaron A. Herbert, P.C., our goal is to give our clients the opportunity to have their voices heard, in addition to the opportunity to receive just compensation for their suffering. We know how to stand up against big insurance agencies and large companies whose aim is to reduce the settlements that injured clients receive. We accept credit cards, offer free initial consultations and are always on hand to answer questions our clients may have about their case.
